post_title: T206 Jennings One Hand - 10 different backs, incl. Lennox, Cycle, EPDG, Coupon
post_content:
I am looking to sell some or all of my Jennings 1-Hand group. All cards are in poor but presentable condition.

Sweet Cap 350/460 - $120
Piedmont 350 - $110

Lennox - $2100 SOLD
Cycle - $400 (trimmed) SOLD
Polar Bear - $120 PSA 1 SOLD
Coupon type 2 - $140 PSA 1 SOLD
EPDG - $150 SGC A SOLD
Tolstoi - $150 SGC 1 SOLD
Piedmont 350 - $110
Old Mill - $160 SOLD
Sovereign - $125 SOLD

I would prefer to sell in groups or all together, so I'd offer significant discounts for those purchases.
I will take the Coupon , LMK , Thanks
Lennox photo added. If I am off base on price, make me an offer - I will not be offended.
